hypothesis: Seattle is the largest inland city in the state of Washington.
premise: + Seattle + With an estimated 704,352 residents , Seattle is the largest city in both the state of Washington and the Pacific Northwest region of North America . + Seattle + Seattle  is a seaport city on the west coast of the United States and the seat of King County , Washington . + Washington (state) + Washington  is a state in the Pacific Northwest region of the United States located north of Oregon , west of Idaho , and south of the Canadian province of British Columbia on the coast of the Pacific Ocean . + Puget Sound + Puget Sound  is a sound along the northwestern coast of the U.S. state of Washington , an inlet of the Pacific Ocean , and part of the Salish Sea . + Seattle + The city is situated on an isthmus between Puget Sound ( an inlet of the Pacific Ocean ) and Lake Washington , about 100 mi south of the Canada - United States border .
explanation_1: Seattle is the largest city in the state of Washington.
